page_title: S4X mixing and producing studio headphones – OLLO Audio

specs.label: Speaker
specs.value: Dynamic neodymium 50 mm; PET 25u membrane; 2-layered coil

specs.label: Impedance
specs.value: 32 ohms (speaker section lists 32 ohms; also mentions ~30 ohm)

specs.label: Sensitivity
specs.value: 109 dB SPL @ 1 Vrms @ 1 kHz (30 ohm output)
